entity.name: UFC 249: Ferguson and Gaethje set to face off for the interim lightweight title
entity.description: The UFC 249 is set to also see Henry Cejudo defend the bantamweight title against former titleholder Dominick Cruz.

text: @marc_raimondi This is disgusting, and the @ufc should be ashamed of taking this approach. But their history shows that instead, DW will rage at the people reporting this, and talk about how good the card was. Completely missing the point that it never needed to happen. #COVID19 #UFC249
